title: MySQL database replica is not running properly
description: A database replica is a copy of a database that is synchronized with the original database to provide fault tolerance, scalability, and backup capabilities. This monitor tracks the health of replication processes.

definition.message: Replica_IO_Running and/or Replica_SQL_Running is not running on replica {{host.name}}. Consider investigating to restore full data replication.
definition.name: [MySQL] Replica {{host.name}} is not running properly
